subproject.description: The purpose of this project is to provide support to the establishment of Sharrprodhimi Stewardship Authority by assisting in the formulation of an integrated development strategy as well as implementing a series of pilot activities that would contribute to creating a sustainable development framework for Dragash/Dragas municipality e.g. reducing loss of bio-diversity (Preparatory Phase: 12 months). Subject to achieving the benchmarks set out in the preparatory phase, this will be followed-up by a 3 year sustained period of implementing the strategy (Impelmentation Phase).
subproject.title: Preparatory Assistance Dragash

subproject.description:
The purpose of this three-year project is to provide continuing support to the establishment of a sustainable development framework for Dragash/Dragas Municipality, one of the poorest municipalities in Kosovo, and where biodiversity valuable for Kosovo and for South East Europe exist. This project  proposal  builds  upon  the  results, achievements and  problem  analysis (Annex  V) developed over a one-year preparatory phase project implemented by UNDP Kosovo, with funding from the Government of Finland'.                                                 I
The project will promote sustainable development focusing on: i the conservation of biodiversity; ii) the re-establishment and development of improved local businesses based on sustainable land use;iii) environmentally  sound energy services and sustainable development principles; and iv) improved capacities and empowerment  of local governments1  community leaders and women to promote development in collaboration with central level sectors'.
The conservation of biodiversity in the Dragash/Dragas area c n only possible with the improved livelihood of those communities living in the area. This should b  based on sustainable development
principles and gender equality, especially with regard to the use land and natural resources, and on
the provision of sufficient basic services. Targeting the development of the energy sector will also
raise the capability of the community and municipality to ensure sustainable use of natural resources and support business development. In addition, enhancing the capacities of local government and various stakeholders/ especially women, to manage development in a sustainable manner is a key component for the short-, medium- and long-term success in Dragash/DragaS.
The project objective and results will support the Government of Kosovo in adhering to European
standards and international frameworks, especially with regard of the protection of biodiversity, and 
enhanced environment and gender equality.
subproject.title: Sustainable Develop in Dragash

title: Preparatory Assistance to Sustainable Develop.in Dragash
